you got an old nvidia card?
ime older nvidia cards = you have to manually tweak xorg.conf to get them running with all the resolutions
and how do I do that ?
1. sudo apt-get install envyng-core 2. sudo envyng -t 3. select recomended
should I install the 71 or the 96 ?
what is the nvidia card model?
did you install the driver envyng recommended
you are probably going to have to tweak xorg.conf to get ALL the resolutions. You stuck with 800x600?
did you install the driver envyng recommended?
sudo gedit /etc/X11/xorg.conf. Look at the Section "Monitor" I added HorizSync      30.0 - 70.0   VertRefresh    60.0 to get an old nvidia card to display all the resolutions
Thank you very much ! it solved the problem ! Now I have all the resolution I needed !!
